TopicTitle: Saving games with missing mod parts

Articles.Content:
If you try opening a save game that contains existing flights that contain mod parts for which the corresponding mod isn't instaled

  • The save loads
  • You get an error for every craft containing missing parts
  • It automatically overwrites your save 

You go "oops, I forgot to install the burger mod", exit and install the mod and start the game again

Too late! the game saved itself without the mod parts and your flying burgers are lost and gone forever.

So the suggestion is that loading a game with missing mod parts disables auto saving, at least before the player has confirmed that they are OK with it.
